title: Inherited Traits, John Legend, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Inherited Traits, John Legend, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Good morning y'all!  Do you ever have morning greetings that you dislike?  We see that our parents give us more traits than we think.  John Legend is honored.  Junior gives us poetry and asks a certain question in the process.  The Democratic Debate is continued.  Sheryl Underwood stops by and mentions Rev. Al Sharpton, Bill Clinton and more.  In Miss Carla's Reality Update there are people in their feelings and someone puts a ring on it.  A professional surfer in Jacksonville, FL gets bitten by a shark and goes straight to the bar.  In J's What We Learned Today, the crew learned much about one particular subject and what need to be done about it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
